Package at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.controls

This package provides control elements, mostly dialogs, for the SOMViewer application.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractSelectionPanel  
AbstractViewerControl This class implements basic functionality for a control panel in the SOMViewer application.
AutoRoutePanel  
ClassLegendPane Displays the class legend, i.e.
ClusterBoderColorChooser  
ClusteringControl The control panel for the clustering functionality.
ColorChooser A generic color chooser dialog.
ColourLegendTable Deprecated. use ClassColorTableModel and an ordinary JTable instead.
ComparisonPanel A control that allows comparing two or more selected areas in regard to the labels they contain.
DocSOMPanel This class provides the link to the DocViewPanel
GHSOMNavigationPanel A panel providing drill down and roll up features for a hierarchical growing som.
LabelEditColorChooser The color chooser panel used to edit colors of labels.
MapDetailPanel This class implements a panel that allows the user to change various details of the map.
MapOverviewPane Implements an overview of the MapPNode, indicating the currently displayed area of the map.
MultichannelPlaybackPanel  
PaletteDisplayer Component to display a Palette.
PalettePanel Implements a graphical elements displaying the currently used Palette.
PlaygroundPanel  
PlaylistEvaluationPane  
PlaySOMPanel This class represents the panel for the PlaySOM,
it provides controls for exporting and editing of selected playlists.
QuerySOMPanel This class implements a user-interface to send queries to the map.

Package at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.controls Description

This package provides control elements, mostly dialogs, for the SOMViewer application.
